name: PacBoy
description:
GDL submission

little game i made in 72h time frame.

Joystick is advised.

A B X Y to craft an item.

Item cost 10 of corresponding material.

When you collide with enemies it decrease crafted item counter.

If you don't have enough counters you die(and game dies too).


https://youtu.be/-jLVDyAY6bY
